content.question: The purpose of the survey above was to

choices.label: implement the transfer of land in the Quebec Act
help finalize the terms of the Treaty of Paris ending the French and Indian War
encourage settlement and to facilitate the sale of land sold in 640-acre lots
divide up the area explored by Lewis and Clark
facilitate the further expansion of slavery

content.answer: encourage settlement and to facilitate the sale of land sold in 640-acre lots

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify  a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience.
